channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins NS-ND Integration Performance Publisher Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins NS-ND Integration Performance Publisher Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-38666|2024-08-03T11:02:14.637Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ns-nd%20integration%20performance%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins NS-ND Integration Performance Publisher Plugin 4.8.0.146 and earlier unconditionally disables SSL/TLS certificate and hostname validation for several features.

item.title: CVE-2022-41227|2024-08-03T12:35:49.588Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ns-nd%20integration%20performance%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins NS-ND Integration Performance Publisher Plugin 4.8.0.129 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-34191|2024-08-03T08:16:17.227Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ns-nd%20integration%20performance%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins NS-ND Integration Performance Publisher Plugin 4.8.0.77 and earlier does not escape the name of NetStorm Test parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-41229|2024-08-03T12:35:49.575Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ns-nd%20integration%20performance%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins NS-ND Integration Performance Publisher Plugin 4.8.0.134 and earlier does not escape configuration options of the Execute NetStorm/NetCloud Test build step, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-41228|2024-08-03T12:35:49.633Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ns-nd%20integration%20performance%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins NS-ND Integration Performance Publisher Plugin 4.8.0.129 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permissions to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials.
